sentence: Unilever PLC ( UL ) will begin trading ex-dividend on August 02, 2018.
A cash dividend payment of $0.448 per share is scheduled to be paid on September 05, 2018.
Shareholders who purchased UL prior to the ex-dividend date are eligible for the cash dividend payment.
This represents an -5.49% decrease from the prior dividend payment.
At the current stock price of $57.01, the dividend yield is 3.14%.
The previous trading day's last sale of UL was $57.01, representing a -5.19% decrease from the 52 week high of $60.13 and a 12.36% increase over the 52 week low of $50.74.
UL is a part of the Basic Industries sector, which includes companies such as Procter & Gamble Company ( PG ) and Unilever NV ( UN ).
Zacks Investment Research reports UL's forecasted earnings growth in 2018 as 12.65%, compared to an industry average of 10.1%.
For more information on the declaration, record and payment dates, visit the UL Dividend History page.
Our Dividend Calendar has the full list of stocks that have an ex-dividend today.

It also has the highest percent weighting of UL at 1.6%.
